column1: Smoque BBQ////The Average: The *Corn Muffins and *Baked Beans are average
column2: as well as the greasy *Fries- I love that they use unskinned potatoes for them (think 5Guys). I used to go on weeknights and beat the crowds when I lived in the area
column3: but now that it's a bit of a drive I think it will only be an occasional visit. It is certainly worth at least one visit
column4: because if it is your style of BBQ (esp sauce) then you'll be in love!
